effect.shortEffect: Halves damage from fire moves and burns.
effect.full: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire-type moves and burns.

description.diamond-pearl: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.
description.platinum: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.
description.black-white: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.
description.black-2-white-2: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.
description.x-y: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.
description.sun-moon: The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
description.sword-shield: The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
